Did u guys bother to copy the crack files from the SKIDROW folder over to ur install directory? U have to do that with each content release.

ATTENTION: Everyone having trouble with this please check this list! This solution worked for me and may work for some of you! I suppose you want Fallout: New Vegas + all available DLC so just follow this!!

1. Install F:NV from this link: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5896532/Fallout.New.Vegas-SKIDROW-[tracker.BTARENA.org].iso 

Remember to copy crack from SKIDROW folder to INSTALL folder

2. Install F:NV HH from this link: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6404371/Fallout_New_Vegas_Honest_Hearts_DLC-SKIDROW

Remember to install Honest Hearts BEFORE Dead Money AND use the fix from this site!!

3. Install Dead Money from this link: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6200435/Fallout_New_Vegas_update_5_and_Dead_Money_DLC_-_Skidrow

AND remember to copy crack from dead money folder to install folder!

Now you're done! Enjoy playing Fallout: New Vegas!
